meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Farewell to the Cardinal Thousands are to gather today for an intricately choreographed funeral service for Cardinal John O'Connor, as dignitaries and parishioners recall his life and work.
Farewell to the Cardinal Thousands are to gather today for an intricately choreographed funeral service for Cardinal John O'Connor, as dignitaries and parishioners recall his life and work.
Missing at Spring Auctions On the eve of the multimillion-dollar spring auctions at Sotheby's in New York, Diana D. Brooks, the former president and chief executive, finds her life in limbo.
Douglas Fairbanks Jr. Dies The dashing star of scores of films, who also produced television shows, socialized with British royalty and did volunteer work on behalf of war victims, was 90.
